name: Luna
description: A tactician with little patience, but calm attitude. Her thirst for knowledge drove her to the magic city of Juno, where the secrets of the world are stored.

name: Rose
description: A noble who wants to become the perfect hero. After her journey to Ash Vacuum, she currently seeks to bridge the gap between nobility and commoners.

name: Lily
description: A charismatic merchant, in love with life. Always being the reliable one, she now struggles to accept the decay of her strength, as magic overtakes physicality.

name: Mekina
description: Vi, but less violent... I think.

name: Ceffy
description: ARE YOU A KID OR ARE YOU A SQUID?
